full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,DPAL MGON DON LNGA GSER SKYEMS 'BUL TSUL LEGS TSOGS LHUN 'GRUB MA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(ZHES DPAL MGON DON LNGA'I GSER SKYEMS @008B 'BUL TSUL LEGS TSOGS LHUN GRUB ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RTZOD PA'I DUS KYI THA MA'I RANG CAG SEMS CAN RNAMS LA, ,MI DANG ME MA YIN GYI GNOD PA CHAR LTAR 'BAB PA'I DUS 'DI LA, ,RANG GZHAN KUN LA PHAN PA DANG, KHYAD PAR RIGS DANG RUS SHIN TU MTHO ZHING PHUN SUM TSOGS PA DNAG DAM TSIG GTZANG MA RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA THU SHE YE THU GUN KHUN TE LING TU GI CHE RIN CHEN RDO RJE DON DU BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ,SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG DZNY'A NA MING CAN GYIS BRIS PA'O, ,BSTAN 'GRO YONGS LA PHAN 'DOGS PAR GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS 'BAR GYUR CIG ,)
